column1: The Pit Room////At around 8pm on a Friday
column2: there was a line actually leaving the door
column3: so I figured this place would be bomb. (By the time I'd left
column4: the line was going across the parking lot!) However
column6: as the service is pretty fast. I think I waited 30 minutes or less. You seat yourself (it's wouldn't seem like it
column7: but there are plenty of places to seat yourself even though this place gets *packed*) after going through the lines for food/pickled veggies.
